channel.title: Plz help me with my 508 server!
channel.description: when I run it I can get on but no one else can do u have to portforward differently or something. I am just very aggrivated at this because so many ppl on my server want to get on it I'll give mid to any1 who helps me!

item.title: Plz help me with my 508 server!
item.dc:creator: @negative101 negative101
item.description:
@negative101 wrote:

I have all of that but there still is the problem of people not being able to get on through the client that is for the server :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2008, 10:09:07 pm[/size][hr]um I really need a really good owner of a 508 server to help me
Any1 out there one?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2008, 01:57:00 am[/size][hr]hello any can help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Plz help me with my 508 server!

item.title: Plz help me with my 508 server!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Revolution Project Revolution
item.description:
@Project_Revolution wrote:

You have to port forward, open the port through your firewall settings and also have no-ip and have it running…

http://www.no-ip.com/

create an account, download, make a no-ip and run the DUC

Read full topic
